channel.title: Midi CC select select order
channel.description: I know this might be a long shot, but you don't know if you don't ask.. !! Given the below image that allows you to select what CC value you want to assign to the parameter, what I would like to know is, is it flexible enough to simply change the format of the selections. Currently it shows 16 rows and 8 columns, is it possible to arrange them into 8 rows and 16 columns or any other possible combination to match the controller I am using.. ? :thinking:

item.title: Midi CC select select order
item.dc:creator: @Captain_Burek Daniel BÃ¼ring
item.description:
@Captain_Burek wrote:

I wouldn't think so. You'd have to hack the GUI.

Read full topic

I know this might be a long shot, but you don't know if you don't ask.. !!

Given the below image that allows you to select what CC value you want to assign to the parameter, what I would like to know is, is it flexible enough to simply change the format of the selections.
